availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac E. Johnson (Rowan County, Kentucky, tavern keeper and justice of the peace)

body.p: Rowan County, Kentucky, clerk, tavern keeper, and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Mary W. Nelson Johnson in Bath County, Kentucky, on September 24, 1853. Father of Jesse A. Johnson and J.B.C. Johnson. Clerk in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Tavern keeper in Rowan County, Kentucky, in 1860. Justice of the peace in Rowan County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 1, p. 6B-7A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rowan County, Morehead, p. 641-642.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994028, Bath County Marriages,.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994054, Rowan County Births.
